section.title: Setting up a Customer Account
section.para: The portal home page is displayed. From this page, it is necessary to create a customer account before proceeding.

procedure.title: Creating a Customer Account - Screen One

important.para: The user account cannot be edited once it is created. Ensure all information is correct before the form information is submitted.

important.para: The Phone field must contain the SIP address specified in the Twinkle account. The format is sip:<username>@<IP Address>:<Port>, for example sip:customer@127.0.0.1:5059. If the SIP address is incorrectly entered, the server will not be able to call the customer.
